attributes.label: Strength
attributes.description: Physical power and athletic ability. Affects melee attacks and carrying capacity.

attributes.label: Dexterity
attributes.description: Agility, reflexes, and balance. Affects AC, initiative, and ranged attacks.

attributes.label: Constitution
attributes.description: Health, stamina, and vital force. Affects hit points and concentration.

attributes.label: Intelligence
attributes.description: Reasoning and memory. Affects investigation and arcane knowledge.

attributes.label: Wisdom
attributes.description: Awareness and insight. Affects perception and divine magic.

attributes.label: Charisma
attributes.description: Force of personality and leadership. Affects persuasion and deception.
